title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 485 - Revision Of Returns And Judicial Review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 485 - Revision Of Returns And Judicial Review

State Regulations
§ 485.1 - Revision of returns
§ 485.2 - Judicial review
§ 485.3 - Service of notices on taxpayers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 485

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 509

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
